description: Block codegen of DX12 raw structs to JSON FieldToJson() conversion functions. We don't need all of these for the convert tool since it walks the tree of Decoded versions and only uses these for simple terminal cases. Might as well implement these lazily on-demand as we have a use for them.
todo2: Remove the ones below which can be handled with anon union support (Look at decoded struct generator for anon union handling).
todo3: Add even more structs below if we never convert the raw versions and only the decoded versions.
